attributes.title: Sonic at the Cinema - Funhaus Animated
attributes.description:
Did you know that there's a character in the Sonic universe named "Milk" who is described as "a Chao who was once mistaken for a Wisp at Eggman's interstellar amusement park"? You did? What the f*ck is wrong with you? 

Follow us on Twitter:

attributes.title: Coming Up Empty - Funhaus Animated
attributes.description:
Hey fellas. We here at Funhaus would like to remind you that before you begin taking any sort of male birth control, you should always consult with your doctor first as to why your girlfriend is so selfish and uptight.

attributes.title: HR Nightmares - Funhaus BTS Office Tour
attributes.description:
For the amount of pooping that takes place in that little bathroom, you'd swear the Rooster Teeth staff drinks nothing but coffee and eats nothing but cigarettes and bales of hay.

attributes.title: Aladdin Rubs It Out - Funhaus Animated
attributes.description:
You think you're mad about blue Will Smith? Just wait until Jayden shows up in a cameo as Genie's son and starts singing about his line of purses or that new math he invented or whatever.

attributes.title: See You Soon, Bruce - Funhaus News
attributes.description:
You heard right. Ol' Papa Bruce is moving on, but we knocked him over the head with table leg and strapped him to a chair for one more chat before he could run screaming for the door. Love you, brother.

attributes.title: Mars Madness - Funhaus Animated
attributes.description:
Modern American Capitalism:
Billionaires: "I have such a stupid amount of money I'm literally going to build a private spaceship to fire my ass off of this dying planet."
You: "Maybe if I vacuum my Camry real good I can get some asshole to pay me seven bucks to drive him to Taco Bell. 

Follow us on Twitter:

attributes.title: Band AIDS - Funhaus Animated
attributes.description:
Make all the jokes you want but Reel Big Fish will always have a special place in my heart. "Sell Out" was the song playing on the radio when I didn't lose my virginity for four years of high school.

Follow us on Twitter:
